ca.ualberta.cs.completemytask

Class Settings

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.cs.completemytask.Settings

  • public class Settings
extends java.lang.Object
    A singleton to handle the settings of of the application. Currently only holds the apps user.
    Author:
    Michael Feist
